skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Town-class light cruiser, Sheffield. I've basically only fought against Iron Blood, having witnessed the demise of Scharnhorst, and participated in the hunt for Bismarck and Tirpitz. However, I underwent repairs throughout the end of the Second Great War and was unable to sortie. If there's nothing else you'd like to know, I would like to head back now.
skins.acquisition: Ah... I thought you were a vermin, so I fired on instinct... You're my new Master? Excuse me. I am a member of the Royal Maids, Light Cruiser Sheffield. I am yours to command.
skins.login: Please mind your step, Master... Right there... is where I just mopped.
skins.details: Hmm? "Cleaning" things up with a gun falls perfectly within a maid's normal line of duty, Master.
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Master, I love you." Please believe me, I put at least 30% emotion into those words.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Master, if you wish to take a nap, please tell me ahead of time. I will make sure you don't oversleep, with this gun.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Belfast dotes on you too much, Master. At this rate, I'm afraid that you will turn into a useless lump of driftwood.
skins.secretaryTouch: Pest- I mean, Master, what requests do you have? I beg your pardon, that was a slip of the tongue.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I do hope you have this same kind of strong spirit on the battlefield.

skins.shipDescription: ... Did you find out about my undercover identity? You leave me no choice. Master, I cannot allow you to leave this room... Of course I'm jesting, it's merely a hobby.
skins.acquisition: ... Did you find out about my undercover identity? You leave me no choice. Master, I cannot allow you to leave this room... Of course I'm jesting, it's merely a hobby.
skins.login: Master, what kinds of missions are we to carry out tonight?
skins.details: Maid by day, and secret agent by night? Hmm, that does fit the Royal style. Unfortunately for you, it's just your imagination.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The slumbering city, silent and dark, inexplicably makes me feel at ease...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Master, it is not incomprehensible that you would desire some excitement in your life, but please focus on the work at hand.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Do not let your guard down for even a second, and always be ready to fight. From this point, a secret agent and a maid are quite similar. Huh? Maids don't have to fight? Master, your jests are quite rich.
skins.secretaryTouch: Master, you don't have to come all the way up to get me. It's going to be a pain to get you back down safely.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Out of respect for your bravery, I shall reserve this special bullet just for you.

skins.shipDescription: The Sakura Empire's summer festivals... they're quite noisy. It will be difficult to keep things clean with so many people around... Despite that, I'm still having a good time. Is there a problem?
skins.acquisition: The Sakura Empire's summer festivals... they're quite noisy. It will be difficult to keep things clean with so many people around... Despite that, I'm still having a good time. Is there a problem?
skins.login: So this is where you were, Master. I was afraid that you had gotten lost and almost mobilised the entire Maid Team. What exactly were you doing?
skins.details: Swiftsure, don’t stay in your room while the festival is going on. Go out there and socialise with the others. Of course it's worth the effort...
skins.secretaryIdle1: So this is cotton candy... Mmf.. It's very sweet... Nn... What are you waiting for?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Master, what do you think about this festival? If you're enjoying it, perhaps we can go to a similar Western-style event next time.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Southampton, why did you run off to the festival when you're supposed to be on duty? Ugh... What am I going to do with you...
skins.secretaryTouch: This outfit is quite breezy. I will have to thank Ms. Victorious on behalf of the Maid Team.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I keep a gun with me at all times.

skins.JPClientName: ブラックロウ?アウトフィット
skins.shipDescription: The fact that you're asking your own maid to be your partner at the ball shows a concerning lack of gumption as a human being... However, if you go and make a fool of yourself, it will reflect poorly upon my standing as a maid. Therefore, I have no choice but to accompany you.
